text: bal atakhadh hula' almushrikun 'awlia' min dun allah yatawalawnahum, fallah wahdah hu alwly yatawalaah eabduh bialeibadat waltaaeati, wytwlla eibadih almuminin bi'iikhrajihim min alzulumat 'iilaa alnuwr wa'iieanatihim fi jmye 'umurihim, wahu yuhyi almawtaa eind albueth, wahu ealaa kli shay' qaduyurun, la yaejizh shaya'a
